info.name: 4Chan Dark Minimal Theme
info.description: Based of badjokr's theme (https://userstyles.org/styles/126275/4chan-google-theme-april-fools-2016-theme) with some minor edits to make it cleaner and darker.

data.title: This is almost perfect, I love it.
The reply box looks pretty ugly. That aside, the theme looks pretty nice.
After using it for a while, the missing buttons are kind of an issue
